title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in TH (Table Header), selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. The expected behavior is either the removal of this menu option or, preferably, the addition of Javadoc on the selected field.
OB: When the 'Add Javadoc' option is selected from the context menu on a field in TH, no action occurs.
EB: When the 'Add Javadoc' option is selected from the context menu on a field in TH, Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the Table Header (TH).
3. Right-click on a field in TH to open the context menu.
4. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option.
5. Verify that Javadoc is not added to the selected field.
